channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: After 23 years living in Canada, today's buyer is returning to the UK for good. With a budget of ?400,000, she is looking to make her rural escape to Devon, but there's a catch - she has never been to the county before. She need not worry because Nicki Chapman has, many times before. Away from the house search, Nicki discovers how to be a friend indeed to an exhausted bee-in-need!
